General.Name: CJ CGV
General.Description: CJ CGV Co., Ltd. engages in the screening and operation of multiplex theaters in South Korea. It operates The Private Cinema, a private screening service; Cine de Chef, a place that includes cinema and restaurant services; 4DX, a five sensation theater experience hall; ScreenX, a multi-screen theater; SphereX, a hemispherical shape theater; and SoundX, a 3D stereo system. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
